document_data.name: ''Cape of the Fire Bath''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Capes of the fire bath''''' were common [[enchanted]] [[cloak]]s worn by worshipers of [[Kossuth]].
document_data.Description: These capes were dyed in brilliant red color and decorated with shimmering embroidered flames.
document_data.Powers: ''Capes of the fire bath'' shielded their wearers from extreme heat, magical flames of spells, and even fiery [[dragon breath]]. Additionally, these cloaks improved the wearers' reaction and defenses against physical and magical threats.
document_data.History: These items were created for the use of influential [[cleric]]s and worshipers of Kossuth, however, by the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], these flaming capes entered a wide rotation among spellcasters of the Realms. In [[1372 DR]], these capes could be purchased from the [[Sorceller's Encapsulate]] of Daggerford.
